user_query: I'm organizing a company event and need some ideas for team-building activities. Can you recommend popular activities and venues in our city? Also, fetch the top posts by a specific username and the top memes from the Reddit meme API.

TaskList.description: Fetch popular team-building activities and venues in the user's city.
Fetch the top posts by a specific username from a social media platform.
Fetch the top memes from the Reddit meme API.
